title: GSMA hosts first-ever Digital Nation Summit in Pakistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 04 (APP):The Global System for Mobile Communications Association (GSMA) is hosting its inaugural Digital Nation Summit in Pakistan on August 7.
Organized in collaboration with the Ministry of IT & Telecom, the event underscores a collective commitment to a digital future. The GSMA Digital Nation Summit will feature key discussions aimed at harnessing the impact of mobile technology to develop a sustainable and inclusive Digital Pakistan.
Participants will have the opportunity to engage with industry pioneers, influential figures, and thought leaders, expanding their understanding and gaining valuable insights into the future of digital innovation.
